Periodic B-spline basis for "HH:MM" times

Source: R/WHcircular.R
HHMM.Bspline.Rd

Generates the periodic B-spline basis matrix for times-of-day in "HH:MM" string format with the specified interior knots and degree, evaluated at the values of x.

Usage

HHMM.Bspline(x, knots = NULL, degree = 3)

Arguments

x

String vector of times in "HH:MM" format.

knots

Numeric vector of interior knot locations in hours (boundary knots are fixed at 0 and 24). Default = 6, 12, 18.

degree

Degree of the piecewise polynomial. Default = 3.

Value

A numeric matrix of length(x) rows and length(knots) columns.

Details

Wrapper function for splines2::bSpline().
